'''Bats and Pots'''<ref>{{tweet|CornerHardMC|1833211870804857139|"Bats and Pots" and "Armored Paws" are game drops we've had thus far, but they'll vary in size and some may be larger in scope|September 9, 2024}}</ref><ref>[https://www.minecraft.net/content/dam/minecraftnet/games/minecraft/game-updates/Bats-and-Pots_01_Header_1170x500%20.jpg Bats-and-Pots_01_Header_1170x500%20.jpg]</ref> is a [[game drop]]<ref>{{tweet|CornerHardMC|1833203939426373917|"Bats and Pots" and "Armored Paws" are both considered "game drops"|September 9, 2024}}</ref> released on December 5, 2023,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-java-edition-1-20-3|Minecraft Java Edition 1.20.3|December 5, 2023}}</ref><ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/21750153148173|title=Minecraft - 1.20.50 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=December 5, 2023}}</ref> as [[Java Edition 1.20.3]] and [[Bedrock Edition 1.20.50]], which adds new functionalities for [[decorated pot]]s, redesigns bats and adds an experimental toggle for features that would be included in [[Tricky Trials|the next major update]].<ref>{{snap|23w40a|October 4, 2023}}</ref><ref>{{snap|23w41a|October 11, 2023}}</ref>

It was not originally considered a game drop upon release and was only retroactively referred to as such after the release of [[Armored Paws]].

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Decorated_Pot_(N)_JE2_BE2.png|32px]] [[Decorated Pot]]'''
* Now can store up to a single stack of one type of item.
** [[Hopper]]s, [[minecarts with hopper]]s, and [[dropper]]s can now insert and/or extract items from them.
** [[Redstone Comparator]]s can now read the number of items in them.
** [[Player]]s can interact with them and insert items into them.
*** Player interactions with them cause them to wobble and trigger a vibration frequency of 11.
** They have no GUI, and need to be broken to retrieve their content by players.
* Now can be broken by projectiles, which cause them to shatter and drop their contents.
* Now has new sounds for breaking, shattering and being stepped on.
* Now can stack up to 64.
* Now appears in the "Redstone" tab of the [[Creative inventory]].
* Now, when blockstate <code>cracked</code> set to <code>true</code>, decorated pots always shatter when broken.{{only|java}}
* Now can utilize loot tables and read from the <code>LootTable</code> tag key.{{only|java}}
=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Bat JE4 BE3.png|32px]] [[File:Bat (Hang) JE4 BE3.png|32px]] [[File:Bat JE4 BE3.gif|32px]] [[Bat]]'''
* The model, animation, and texture have been updated.
